name: 28 Years Later
description:
Click fullscreen button for a better experience if your graphics card can handle it.  

Make sure hardware acceleration is turned on your browser.

Controls
  • WSAD keys to control tank.
  • Left mouse button to fire machine gun.
  • Right mouse button to fire tank cannon.
  • Different camera modes can be accessed with F1, F2, F3, F4
Levels

Level One: Zombies

     Very easy, used for a tutorial.

Level Two: Starship Trooper Warrior Bugs

     Fast enemy, low damage, but dangerous in packs.

Level Three: Alien Xenomorphs

     These enemies will melt you tank, keep your distance.

Level Four: X800 Terminator

     Tough target, multiple tank cannon rounds needed to destroy them.

Level Five: All four apocalyptic enemies

     You will need to deal with all four enemy types.

Level Six: Godzilla boss

     Fire as many missiles as you can.

Enemy Breakdown HealthSpeedDetectionDamageLevel One: ZombiesLowSlowLowLowLevel Two:

More levels and multiplayer planned!
